name: Out of Depth (Adubs, MetaToshi)
description:
Controls:

[ WASD ] to move

[ E ] to interact, exit Inventory

[ SPACE ] to continue dialogue

[ X ] to exit the crime scene

---

Introducing: Detective Jack Daniels 
(YOU, the player)!

-

New York, 1937

Political turmoil suffocates the air, and the election is up and coming very soon.
You arrive at your office, and you notice mail in your mailbox - a new case.

The case reads: the suicide of John Thompson - a political candidate that was in the running for mayor of New York City.

Was this case truly a suicide, or was someone pulling some strings behind the scenes?

---

Meet the Cast:

  Mayor Crowley

  Lord Reynard

  Commander Pike

Professor Bates

Lady Faust

Jenny
